PasswordPage.code_or_link_error: Verification code expired, please restart the registration process
PasswordPage.common_password_error: Password setup error, please try again later

MainPage.promotion_info: AI scoring with real-time feedback to improve your English writing skills. During public testing, log in to get scoring points worth 19.9 USD for free
MainPage.left_T3: Use our professional AI engine to receive instant, detailed, high-quality feedback and performance assessments on your writing.
MainPage.line2_title: Who Can Benefit from Our Platform?
MainPage.line2_left_text_li1: Graduates from countries like South Korea, Thailand, China, Vietnam, aiming to pursue further studies in the US, UK, Canada, Australia, etc.
MainPage.line2_left_text_li2: Job seekers and professionals looking to work in English-speaking countries or improve their career prospects.
MainPage.line2_right_text_li1: School English teachers and IELTS instructors who want to provide students with advanced self-assessment and learning tools.
MainPage.line2_right_text_li2: Language schools and other educational organizations aiming to enhance English writing teaching efficiency and upgrade their English curriculum.
MainPage.line3_right_demo1: Thanks to this site’s AI writing coach, my IELTS writing score improved from 5.0 to 6.0! Each submission provided detailed feedback and suggestions, helping me identify weaknesses and progress quickly!
MainPage.line3_right_demo2: This site is fantastic! The AI not only provides accurate scoring but also personalized improvement tips. After a few weeks, my writing skills and vocabulary have significantly improved. Highly recommended for IELTS prep!
MainPage.line4_left_content: Realistic score estimates based on official scoring standards: Grammar, Task Achievement, Coherence, and Vocabulary Range.
MainPage.line4_middle_content: Comprehensive feedback on your writing. Our AI algorithm evaluates your response for accuracy and coherence, as seen through an IELTS examiner’s lens.
MainPage.line4_right_content: Practice daily and track your progress on the dashboard. Enjoy ultimate IELTS essay scoring anytime, anywhere, 24/7.
